review.title: “Lack of vision for future products and little room for advancement.”
review.pros: Pros – Most coworkers are easy going and talented, Decent benefits, ample vacation and personal time, fast paced work environment, flexible working hours
review.cons: Cons – compensation below average, upper management tends to lack a clear sense of direction, employee morale is rarely considered, equipment and supplies are outdated, little room to advance,
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
